snippet: A Thai military court on Tuesday sentenced a woman to seven years in jail for posting material on the Internet said to be insulting to the monarchy.
abstract: Thai military court sentences woman to seven years in jail for online post insulting monarchy.
lead_paragraph: A Thai military court on Tuesday sentenced a woman to seven years in jail for posting material on the Internet said to be insulting to the monarchy.

headline.main: Thai Woman Sentenced for Online Post Insulting Monarchy
headline.print_headline: Post on Monarchy Brings a Jail Term
